autoRefresh.title: Auto Refresh
autoRefresh.description: If true, the plugin will automatically refresh the data.

refreshRate.title: Refresh Rate
refreshRate.description: The number of minutes between data refreshes.  This is only used if autorefresh is true.

batteryName.title: Battery Name
batteryName.description: The name of the battery device.

chargingSwitch.title: Charging Switch
chargingSwitch.description: Adds a button that can trigger automations when your ev begins charging.

plugSwitch.title: Plug Switch
plugSwitch.description: Adds a button that can trigger automations when your ev is plugged in.

application_id.title: Application ID
application_id.description: Enter the application ID from the FordPass API Word Document when you requested access.  Its section 4 - Account Link and the url will have application_id querystring.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Enter the client ID from the FordPass API app when you requested access.  It's section 4 - Account Link and the url will have client_id querystring.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Enter the client secret from the FordPass API app when you requested access.  Usually starts with RHO

code.title: Code
code.description: Enter the code from the FordPass API app
